title: Where Will Google Stock Be in 2024?

Learn More Fool.com contributor Parkev Tatevosian discusses why he likes Alphabet (GOOG 0.21%) (GOOGL 0.04%) stock for 2024 and beyond. *Stock prices used were the afternoon prices of Jan. 25, 2024. The video was published on Jan. 27, 2024. Suzanne Frey, an executive at Alphabet, is a member of The Motley Fool's board of directors. Parkev Tatevosian, CFA has positions in Alphabet. The Motley Fool has positions in and recommends Alphabet. The Motley Fool has a disclosure policy.
